markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=1455)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 318 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Black Butterfly](/Deities.aspx?ID=468), [Mahathallah](/Deities.aspx?ID=591), [Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice)](/Deities.aspx?ID=575), [Sivanah](/Deities.aspx?ID=358)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The target's form appears blurry. It becomes [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4). As the nature of this effect still leaves the target's location obvious, the target can't use this concealment to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63).
name: Blur

</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 318 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Black Butterfly](/Deities.aspx?ID=468), [Mahathallah](/Deities.aspx?ID=591), [Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice)](/Deities.aspx?ID=575), [Sivanah](/Deities.aspx?ID=358)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Target's form becomes blurry and hard to hit.
</summary>
summary: Target's form becomes blurry and hard to hit.
summary_markdown: Target's form becomes blurry and hard to hit.
text: Blur Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 318 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Black Butterfly, Mahathallah, Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice), Sivanah Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 1 minute --- The target's form appears blurry. It becomes concealed. As the nature of this effect still leaves the target's location obvious, the target can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak.
